org.activebpel.rt.message
Class AeMessageData

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.message.AeMessageData
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, IAeMessageData
public class AeMessageData
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeMessageData

Manages data interaction for a WSDL message. Internal normalized message structure used by all engines. These messages are not publicly exposed. For pulic message API see IAeWebServiceMessageData

Field Summary
private  IAeAttachmentContainer mAttachmentContainer
          place holder for optional attachments

          Flag to track if the message data is dirty

          The variable message type for which we are storing data
private  java.util.HashMap mPartData
          Holds on to the part data, the name of the part is its key.
